description: Source code for authentication-related API routes implemented using FastAPI, handling user signup, login, logout, password reset, and email verification functionalities, interfacing with Supabase services.

classes.name: UserResponse
classes.description: Response model representing user information for authenticated users

classes.name: MessageResponse
classes.description: Standard message format for API responses

classes.name: TokenResponse
classes.description: Response model that includes access token details

classes.name: UserSignUpRequest
classes.description: Request model for user sign-up data

classes.name: UserLoginRequest
classes.description: Request model for user login data

classes.name: PasswordResetRequest
classes.description: Request model for initiating password reset

classes.name: PasswordResetConfirmRequest
classes.description: Request model for confirming password reset

methods.name: JSONResponse sign_up(user_data: UserSignUpRequest)
methods.description: Handles user registration, integrates with Supabase for account creation and sends a welcome email.

methods.name: JSONResponse login(credentials: UserLoginRequest)
methods.description: Authenticates user credentials, creates session, and returns access token.

methods.name: JSONResponse logout(current_user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Invalidates user session and logs out the user.

methods.name: JSONResponse forgot_password(request: PasswordResetRequest)
methods.description: Initiates password reset by sending email.

methods.name: JSONResponse reset_password(request: PasswordResetConfirmRequest)
methods.description: Confirms password reset process, typically handled via Supabase.

methods.name: JSONResponse verify_email(token: str, email: str)
methods.description: Verifies user email with provided token.

ctags.name: logout
ctags.pattern: /^async def logout(current_user: Dict[str, Any] = Depends(get_current_user)) -> JSONResponse:$/

ctags.name: verify_email
ctags.pattern: /^async def verify_email(token: str, email: str) -> JSONResponse:$/
